data.eml:eml: Revision of Chinese Dilaridae (Insecta: Neuroptera) (Part III): Species of the genus Dilar Rambur from the southern part of mainland China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Wei, Liu, Xingyue, Aspöck, Horst, Aspöck, Ulrike (2015): Revision of Chinese Dilaridae (Insecta: Neuroptera) (Part III): Species of the genus Dilar Rambur from the southern part of mainland China. Zootaxa 3974 (4): 451-494, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3974.4.1
